text: Esquimalt was a provincial electoral district in the province of British Columbia, Canada. It was one of the province's first twelve ridings upon its entry into Confederation. It was originally a two-member riding. Its successor riding today is Esquimalt-Metchosin. == Demographics == {| class="wikitable" |Population, 2001 | |- |Population change 1996-2001 |% |- |Area (km²) | |- |Population density (people per km²) | |} == Geography == == History == == Notable MLAs == == Election results == Note: Winners of each election are in bold. |- |Independent |Charles Berry Brown |align="right"|5 |align="right"|2.75% |align="right"| |align="right"|unknown |Independent |David Cameron |align="right"|31 |align="right"|17.03% |align="right"| |align="right"|unknown |Independent |Henry S.
